Day 1 of Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2 continues: https://ninten.do/6015qSNoV

Hey Nintendo,

Drop the price.

We won't buy your games for $70-$90.

We won't buy your upgrade packs for games we already bought.

This is what you’re deciding to release with the Switch 2? Really? Glad Ryujinx exists…

No one on earth wants to play handicapped basketball with an awkward skinny, vertical mouse. It's impossible to think that an already stupid, half of a misshapen controller should have mouse functionality, and you should pretend to be disabled! MAXIMUM STUPIDITY!

Looks like it better be free

This game looks uncomfortable to play ngl.
It’s a gimmick game meant to sell a gimmick.
